name: Vulpix
description: If it is attacked by an enemy that is stronger than itself, it feigns injury to fool the enemy and escapes.

attacks.name: Singe
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Ember
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a Fire Energy attached to Vulpix.
